title: Grammys 2017: Demi Lovato Is Wearing the Longest Hair Ever
text: February 12, 2017 Getty Images Demi Lovato knows that if there’s ever a time to wear long hair, it’s at the Grammys 2017. Tonight, the 24-year old singer-songwriter hit the red carpet in much ( much ) longer brunette hair that was absolutely stunning. While most celebrities are going shorter ( and lighter ) Lovato is opting for waist-length beachy wave hair. Now if we think back, we remember that Lovato isn’t a stranger to trying new looks—remember her fuchsia undercut, blue hair and super short buzzed cut? Yeah, she’s the walking definition of badass. You May Also Like Hair Irina Shayk Practically Turned Into a Blonde Bombshell Overnight If we’re being honest, the look wasn’t a complete shock because her longtime hairstylist and colorist, Amber Maynard Bolt , of Nine Zero One salon , posted a photo of the singer with long hair two weeks ago—but we have to say tonight look it’s much, much longer.
